imagingbook.pub.corners

Class ShiTomasiDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.corners.AbstractGradientCornerDetector
      • imagingbook.pub.corners.ShiTomasiDetector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PointFeatureDetector

    public class ShiTomasiDetector
extends AbstractGradientCornerDetector
    This is an implementation of the Shi-Tomasi corner detector, as described in
    J. Shi and C. Tomasi. Good features to track. In “Proceedings of IEEE Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition, CVPR’94”, pp. 593–600, Seattle, WA, USA (1994).
    Version:
    2020-02-20

      float computeScore(float A, float B, float C)

      • computeScore

        public float computeScore(float A,
                          float B,
                          float C)
        Description copied from class: AbstractGradientCornerDetector
        Calculates the corner response score for a single image position (u,v) from the elements A, B, C of the local structure matrix. To be implemented by concrete sub-classes.
        Specified by:
        computeScore in class AbstractGradientCornerDetector
        Parameters:

        B - = Iyy(u,v)
        C - = Iyy(u,v)
        Returns:
        the corner score
